# Changes to CSS Tokenizer

### 2.2.4

_March 13, 2024_

- Correctly tokenize negative zero `-0` (for real this time)

### 2.2.3

_December 31, 2023_

- Improve documentation.

### 2.2.2

_December 15, 2023_

- Fix type definitions
